title: Association of 1, 25 dihydroxyvitamin D with left ventricular hypertrophy and left ventricular diastolic dysfunction in patients with chronic kidney disease
details: J Hyeon, S Kim, BM Ye, SR Kim, DW Lee, SB Lee… - Plos one, 2024
abstract: Left ventricular hypertrophy (LVH) and left ventricular diastolic dysfunction (LVDD) are highly prevalent predictors of cardiovascular disease in individuals with chronic kidney disease (CKD). Vitamin D, particularly 25-hydroxyvitamin D [25 (OH) D] …

title: Downsloping TP Segment in the Precordial Leads on a Standard 12-lead Electrocardiogram: Suspected Cardiac Impulse-tapping Artifact
details: K Takahashi, N Yamamura, K Yamauchi, T Kasamura… - Internal Medicine, 2024
abstract: We herein report an 80-year-old man showing a downsloping TP segment together with an increase in the height of the T wave in the precordial leads on a standard 12- lead electrocardiogram (ECG). Separately, an 87-year-old woman showed only a …

title: Diagnostic performance of unenhanced electrocardiogram-gated cardiac CT for detecting myocardial edema
details: T Emoto, M Kidoh, S Oda, D Sakabe, K Morita… - Medicine, 2024
abstract: To assess the diagnostic performance of unenhanced electrocardiogram (ECG)- gated cardiac computed tomography (CT) for detecting myocardial edema, using MRI T2 mapping as the reference standard. This retrospective study protocol was …
